remarks: Upper bound for the distance between the values of a bounded linear operator.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
blometi.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
blometi.2 $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
blometi.8 $e |- C = ( IndMet ` U ) $.
blometi.d $e |- D = ( IndMet ` W ) $.
blometi.6 $e |- N = ( U normOpOLD W ) $.
blometi.7 $e |- B = ( U BLnOp W ) $.
blometi.u $e |- U e. NrmCVec $.
blometi.w $e |- W e. NrmCVec $.
blometi $p |- ( ( T e. B /\ P e. X /\ Q e. X ) -> ( ( T ` P ) D ( T ` Q ) ) <_ ( ( N ` T ) x. ( P C Q ) ) ) $.
